00006 const ChannelInfo::const_iterator ChannelInfo::cConstItEnd(NULL, SIMTIME_ZERO, SIMTIME_ZERO);
00007 const ChannelInfo::iterator       ChannelInfo::cItEnd(NULL, SIMTIME_ZERO, SIMTIME_ZERO);

00009 void ChannelInfo::addAirFrame(airframe_ptr_t frame, simtime_t_cref startTime)
00010 {
00011   assert(airFrameStarts.count(frame->getTreeId()) == 0);
00012 
00013   //calculate endTime of AirFrame
00014   simtime_t endTime = startTime + frame->getDuration();
00015 
00016   AirFrameMatrix::iterator pos = activeAirFrames.lower_bound(endTime);
00017   if(pos == activeAirFrames.end() || (activeAirFrames.key_comp()(endTime, pos->first))) {
00018       // key does not exists
00019     pos = activeAirFrames.insert(pos, std::make_pair(endTime, AirFrameMatrix::mapped_type()));
00020   }
00021   pos->second.insert(std::make_pair(startTime, frame));
00022 
00023   //add to start time map
00024   airFrameStarts[frame->getTreeId()] = startTime;
00025 
00026   assert(!isChannelEmpty());
00027 }
00028 
00029 void ChannelInfo::addToInactives(airframe_ptr_t frame,
00030                  simtime_t_cref startTime,
00031                  simtime_t_cref endTime)
00032 {
00033   // At first, check if some inactive AirFrames can be removed because the
00034   // AirFrame to in-activate was the last one they intersected with.
00035   checkAndCleanInterval(startTime, endTime);
00036 
00037   if(!canDiscardInterval(startTime, endTime)) {
00038     AirFrameMatrix::iterator pos = inactiveAirFrames.lower_bound(endTime);
00039     if(pos == inactiveAirFrames.end() || (inactiveAirFrames.key_comp()(endTime, pos->first))) {
00040         // key does not exists
00041       pos = inactiveAirFrames.insert(pos, std::make_pair(endTime, AirFrameMatrix::mapped_type()));
00042     }
00043     pos->second.insert(std::make_pair(startTime, frame));
00044   }
00045   else {
00046     airFrameStarts.erase(frame->getTreeId());
00047     delete frame;
00048   }
00049 }
00050 
00051 simtime_t ChannelInfo::findEarliestInfoPoint(simtime_t_cref returnTimeIfEmpty /*= -1*/) const
00052 {
00053   c_min_start_time_fctr fctrMin;
00054 
00055   AirFrameMatrix::const_iterator itActivesMin   = std::min_element(activeAirFrames.begin()  , activeAirFrames.end()  , fctrMin);
00056   AirFrameMatrix::const_iterator itInactivesMin = std::min_element(inactiveAirFrames.begin(), inactiveAirFrames.end(), fctrMin);
00057 
00058   if (itActivesMin != activeAirFrames.end() && itInactivesMin != inactiveAirFrames.end()) {
00059     return std::min(itActivesMin->second.begin()->first, itInactivesMin->second.begin()->first);
00060   }
00061   if (itActivesMin != activeAirFrames.end())
00062     return itActivesMin->second.begin()->first;
00063   if (itInactivesMin != inactiveAirFrames.end())
00064     return itInactivesMin->second.begin()->first;
00065 
00066   return returnTimeIfEmpty;
00067 }
00068 
00069 simtime_t ChannelInfo::removeAirFrame(airframe_ptr_t frame, simtime_t_cref returnTimeIfEmpty /*= -1*/)
00070 {
00071   assert(airFrameStarts.count(frame->getTreeId()) > 0);
00072 
00073   //get start of AirFrame
00074   simtime_t_cref startTime = airFrameStarts[frame->getTreeId()];
00075 
00076   //calculate end time
00077   simtime_t      endTime   = startTime + frame->getDuration();
00078 
00079   //remove this AirFrame from active AirFrames
00080   deleteAirFrame(activeAirFrames, frame, startTime, endTime);
00081 
00082   //add to inactive AirFrames
00083   addToInactives(frame, startTime, endTime);
00084 
00085 
00086   // Now check, whether the earliest time-point we need to store information
00087   // for might have moved on in time, since an AirFrame has been deleted.
00088   if(isChannelEmpty()) {
00089     return returnTimeIfEmpty;
00090   }
00091   return findEarliestInfoPoint(returnTimeIfEmpty);
00092 }
00093 
00094 void ChannelInfo::assertNoIntersections() const {
00095   for(AirFrameMatrix::const_iterator it1 = inactiveAirFrames.begin();
00096     it1 != inactiveAirFrames.end(); ++it1)
00097   {
00098     simtime_t_cref e0 = it1->first;
00099     for(AirFrameMatrix::mapped_type::const_iterator it2 = it1->second.begin();
00100       it2 != it1->second.end(); ++it2)
00101     {
00102       simtime_t_cref s0 = it2->first;
00103 
00104       bool intersects = (recordStartTime > -1 && recordStartTime <= e0);
00105 
00106       for(AirFrameMatrix::const_iterator it3 = activeAirFrames.begin();
00107         it3 != activeAirFrames.end() && !intersects; ++it3)
00108       {
00109         simtime_t_cref e1 = it3->first;
00110         for(AirFrameMatrix::mapped_type::const_iterator it4 = it3->second.begin();
00111           it4 != it3->second.end() && !intersects; ++it4)
00112         {
00113           simtime_t_cref s1 = it4->first;
00114 
00115           if(e0 >= s1 && s0 <= e1)
00116             intersects = true;
00117         }
00118       }
00119       assert(intersects);
00120     }
00121   }
00122 }
00123 
00124 void ChannelInfo::deleteAirFrame(AirFrameMatrix& airFrames,
00125                                  airframe_ptr_t frame,
00126                                  simtime_t_cref startTime, simtime_t_cref endTime)
00127 {
00128   AirFrameMatrix::iterator listIt = airFrames.find(endTime);
00129 
00130   if (listIt != airFrames.end()) {
00131     AirFrameMatrix::mapped_type&          startTimeList = listIt->second;
00132     AirFrameMatrix::mapped_type::iterator itEnd         = startTimeList.upper_bound(startTime);
00133 
00134     for(AirFrameMatrix::mapped_type::iterator it = startTimeList.lower_bound(startTime); it != itEnd; ++it) {
00135       if(it->second == frame || it->second->getTreeId() == frame->getTreeId()) {
00136         startTimeList.erase(it);
00137         if(startTimeList.empty()) {
00138           airFrames.erase(listIt);
00139         }
00140         return;
00141       }
00142     }
00143   }
00144   assert(false);
00145 }
00146 
00147 bool ChannelInfo::canDiscardInterval(simtime_t_cref startTime,
00148                    simtime_t_cref endTime)
00149 {
00150   assert(recordStartTime >= 0 || recordStartTime == -1);
00151 
00152   // only if it ends before the point in time we started recording or if
00153   // we aren't recording at all and it does not intersect with any active one
00154   // anymore this AirFrame can be deleted
00155   return (recordStartTime > endTime || recordStartTime == -1)
00156        && !isIntersecting(activeAirFrames, startTime, endTime);
00157 }
00158 
00159 void ChannelInfo::checkAndCleanInterval(simtime_t_cref startTime,
00160                                         simtime_t_cref endTime)
00161 {
00162   // get through inactive AirFrame which intersected with the passed interval
00163   iterator itInactiveFrames(&inactiveAirFrames, startTime, endTime);
00164   iterator itEnd = end();
00165   for (; itInactiveFrames != itEnd;) {
00166     airframe_ptr_t pInactiveFrame = itInactiveFrames->second;
00167     simtime_t      currentEnd     = itInactiveFrames->first + pInactiveFrame->getDuration();
00168 
00169     if(canDiscardInterval(itInactiveFrames->first, currentEnd)) {
00170       erase(itInactiveFrames++);
00171 
00172       airFrameStarts.erase(pInactiveFrame->getTreeId());
00173       delete pInactiveFrame;
00174       continue;
00175     }
00176     ++itInactiveFrames;
00177   }
00178 }
00179 
00180 bool ChannelInfo::isIntersecting(const AirFrameMatrix& airFrames,
00181                  simtime_t_cref from, simtime_t_cref to)
00182 {
00183   const_iterator it(&airFrames, from, to);
00184   return (it != cConstItEnd);
00185 }
00186 
00187 void ChannelInfo::getIntersections( const AirFrameMatrix& airFrames,
00188                   simtime_t_cref from, simtime_t_cref to,
00189                   AirFrameVector& outVector)
00190 {
00191   const_iterator itEnd = cConstItEnd;
00192   for (const_iterator it(&airFrames, from, to); it != itEnd; ++it) {
00193     outVector.push_back(it->second);
00194   }
00195 }
00196 
00197 void ChannelInfo::getAirFrames(simtime_t_cref from, simtime_t_cref to,
00198                  AirFrameVector& out) const
00199 {
00200   //check for intersecting inactive AirFrames
00201   getIntersections(inactiveAirFrames, from, to, out);
00202 
00203   //check for intersecting active AirFrames
00204   getIntersections(activeAirFrames, from, to, out);
00205 }
